meta.description: An optional addition to True Ending adding new boss music to the Ender Dragon fight
meta.long_description:
# About

An optional addition to True Ending adding new boss music to the Ender Dragon fight. Along with the music that plays during the fight, a special new tune is played when you beat the dragon. The Ender Dragon death sound effect volume is lowered for the tune to be audible.

**Note:** Does not work without the True Ending datapack.

Download True Ending: [https://modrinth.com/datapack/true-ending](https://modrinth.com/datapack/true-ending)

# Technical Changes

Adds the following sounds
- `true_ending:music.dragon`
- `true_ending:music.dragon_defeat`
- `minecraft:music.dragon_ambience`

Lowers the volume of the following sounds
- `minecraft:music.dragon` -> lowered by 50%
- `minecraft:entity.ender_dragon.death` -> lowered by 50%
meta.name: True Ending: Ender Dragon Music
